    Mypost Online Sdn Bhd Vacancies Department Manager

    November 9, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Mypost Online Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Department Manager position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Establishes company business plan by surveying company demand, conferring with people in the community, identifying and evaluating competitors.
    • Oversee and manage overall operations of the department to achieve sales target, profit and growth objectives.
    • Responsible for daily operation of efficiency, productivity and profitability through the effective management and compliance with pre-set operational procedures.
    • To carry day-to-day operations and improve company performance in terms of profitability, sales revenue, customers' awareness and cost control.
    • To maintain good relations with customers & promote company's services.
    • Seek feedback from customers and observe customer’s behavior.
    • Conduct regular analysis to evaluate promotion and sales strategy effectiveness and identify business opportunities as well as conduct business reviews to customer
    • Responsible to train sub-coordinates to cultivate more supervisor.
    • Conduct Training to upgrade Team Member’s skillset.
    • Monitor daily operation and report to manager on timely manner
    • Coordinate with Superior and Sub-coordinates.
    • Knowing to use Zendesk is an additional advantage.

    Requirements:

    • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in any field.
    • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English, Mandarin
    • Be responsible
    • At least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
    • Preferably specialized in Logistics/Supply Chain or equivalent.
    • 精通华语英语国语，以华语为主。
    • 善用电脑，略懂淘宝的运用。
    • 5天半制度
    • 福利可以面谈
    • 工作环境好，同事好相处。
    • 有经验者优先

    Company Overview

    Our main business network is from China to Malaysia via international transit. We provide transportation services of trading & purchases by Air and Sea. Our e-commerce transaction is through Taobao.com and Alipay, an onine payment escrow service.

    In Malaysia we have strong and well-known networks, with the strength and competitiveness of shippers. With the size of 650 square ft. warehouse storage in mainland China, we have a workforce of more than 10 operators, processing Malaysia transit services in China. With over 10 front-desk operators and customer service executives to provide excellent service to your needs.
    Vision:
    MYPOSTONLINE goal is to become Asia's well-known online shopping transit cargo and traders, the company's future direction will become a well-known online shopping in Malaysia freight transit providers, distribution, procurement services, and led the successful sale of home networks in the online shopping industry!
    我司主要经营网络中国至马来西亚 国际中转运输服务 - 空运 / 海运 , 淘宝代购,支付宝充值 ,网购买卖服务
    是全马知名网络有实力与竞争力货运商. 
    在中国内地拥有 650方仓库 ， 聘用超过10名操作手，在中国处理马来西亚中转服务。 
    在国内拥有10余名客服前台，服务顾客。
    公司愿景：
    MYPOSTONLINE目标是成为亚洲知名中转货运与网购贸易商，企业未来走向将会成为一间全马知名的网购货运中转商，配货，采购服务商,并带领网络买卖家在网购行业内成功！ 

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor - Others.
